messages.subject: December holiday resources
messages.msgSnippet: My husband has been teaching Sunday school for the months of November and December, and I have been helping him research the different December holidays. Since
messages.messageBody:
My husband has been teaching Sunday school for the months of November
and December, and I have been helping him research the different
December holidays. Since I had done all that work anyway, I decided
to put together a holiday page for Letter Lane--if you go to
http://www.letterlane.com at the bottom of the page is a link that
says "H is for Happy Holidays".

Just passing this along for anyone who would like some multicultural
holiday resources.

Renee L
